Articles.Content:
I searched, and I don`t think it`s a repost..

I thought it necessary to post this, outstanding work let it inspire all kerbalnauts everywhere to be quite this awesome

Brought to you by Commander Chris Hadfield.
Heh, I was just going to post this ... you beat me to it!
Must be fun making a music video in space.
Yeah, you beat me to it as well. Had to work all day.

I had to check on the forum. The MUST be post in here.

I must be responsible for at least 1000 of the video view count, I can't go on my laptop without listenning/looking to this awesomeness!!

I went to bed with this fabulous picture of Hadfiel in the cockpit, Earth in background... Damned thinking about it keep giving me chicken pox...

Hail to this awesome commander, encline to communicate with us, poor people living on earth, about some of his experiments. He is maybe my new Hero!

now there will be a russian commander, which will may be slightly different in terms of communications...
